value.string:
\074?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?\076
 \074!--
 * FCKeditor - The text editor for Internet - http://www.fckeditor.net
 * Copyright (C) 2003-2009 Frederico Caldeira Knabben
 *
 * == BEGIN LICENSE ==
 *
 * Licensed under the terms of any of the following licenses at your
 * choice:
 *
 * - GNU General Public License Version 2 or later (the "GPL")
 * http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html
 *
 * - GNU Lesser General Public License Version 2.1 or later (the "LGPL")
 * http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl.html
 *
 * - Mozilla Public License Version 1.1 or later (the "MPL")
 * http://www.mozilla.org/MPL/MPL-1.1.html
 *
 * == END LICENSE ==
 *
 * This is the sample templates definitions file. It makes the "templates"
 * command completely customizable.
 *
 * See FCKConfig.TemplatesXmlPath in the configuration file.
 --\076
 \074Templates imagesBasePath="fck_template/images/"\076
 	\074Template title="Image and Title" image="template1.gif"\076
 		\074Description\076One main image with a title and text that surround the image.\074/Description\076
 		\074Html\076
 			\074![CDATA[
 				\074img style="MARGIN-RIGHT: 10px" height="100" alt="" width="100" align="left"/\076
 				\074h3\076Type the title here\074/h3\076
 				Type the text here
 			]]\076
 		\074/Html\076
 	\074/Template\076
 	\074Template title="Strange Template" image="template2.gif"\076
 		\074Description\076A template that defines two colums, each one with a title, and some text.\074/Description\076
 		\074Html\076
 			\074![CDATA[
 				\074table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" border="0"\076
 					\074tbody\076
 						\074tr\076
 							\074td width="50%"\076
 							\074h3\076Title 1\074/h3\076
 							\074/td\076
 							\074td\076\046nbsp;\046nbsp;\046nbsp;\046nbsp;\046nbsp;\046nbsp;\046nbsp;\046nbsp;\046nbsp; \074/td\076
 							\074td width="50%"\076
 							\074h3\076Title 2\074/h3\076
 							\074/td\076
 						\074/tr\076
 						\074tr\076
 							\074td\076Text 1\074/td\076
 							\074td\076\046nbsp;\074/td\076
 							\074td\076Text 2\074/td\076
 						\074/tr\076
 					\074/tbody\076
 				\074/table\076
 				More text goes here.
 			]]\076
 		\074/Html\076
 	\074/Template\076
 	\074Template title="Text and Table" image="template3.gif"\076
 		\074Description\076A title with some text and a table.\074/Description\076
 		\074Html\076
 			\074![CDATA[
 				\074table align="left" width="80%" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"\076\074tr\076\074td\076
 					\074h3\076Title goes here\074/h3\076
 					\074p\076
 					\074table style="FLOAT: right" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="150" border="1"\076
 						\074tbody\076
 							\074tr\076
 								\074td align="center" colspan="3"\076\074strong\076Table title\074/strong\076\074/td\076
 							\074/tr\076
 							\074tr\076
 								\074td\076\046nbsp;\074/td\076
 								\074td\076\046nbsp;\074/td\076
 								\074td\076\046nbsp;\074/td\076
 							\074/tr\076
 							\074tr\076
 								\074td\076\046nbsp;\074/td\076
 								\074td\076\046nbsp;\074/td\076
 								\074td\076\046nbsp;\074/td\076
 							\074/tr\076
 							\074tr\076
 								\074td\076\046nbsp;\074/td\076
 								\074td\076\046nbsp;\074/td\076
 								\074td\076\046nbsp;\074/td\076
 							\074/tr\076
 							\074tr\076
 								\074td\076\046nbsp;\074/td\076
 								\074td\076\046nbsp;\074/td\076
 								\074td\076\046nbsp;\074/td\076
 							\074/tr\076
 						\074/tbody\076
 					\074/table\076
 					Type the text here\074/p\076
 				\074/td\076\074/tr\076\074/table\076
 			]]\076
 		\074/Html\076
 	\074/Template\076
 \074/Templates\076
